resources.string: Buy a 20 minute time-waster for 1 Aura? The purchase lifts all restrictions from this app or item for the next 20 minutes.
You have 0 Aura to waste time. Perform a quest to earn Aura now!
Continue wasting your time, wasting away in the darkness of your own mind\'s creation?
Accessibilty services required to run blockers.
Grant overlay permission to put warnings over blocked items. (Your data remains on your device and is never transferred elsewhere.)
Grant notification permission required to receive quest updates.
Grant precise Location permission to track location for quests. (Your data remains on your device and is never transferred elsewhere.)
Grant camera permission to track position and count reps for quests. (Your data remains on your device and is never transferred elsewhere.)

DigiPaws is copylefted libre software solving screen addiction by regulating app usage through a gamified experience. Easy, adventure, and hard â€” each with unique features and challenges to promote healthy habits.
Access to blocked apps only gives gentle warnings. This is repeated to keep you honest in managing screen time.
The slop is in the immediacy of a quick km walk away, which might be a safe distance. Requires Aura earnt through quests to access a blocked app for 20 min. With every quests, the difficulty rises.
Prevents use of blocked apps altogether.
What do you wish to block?
Supported platforms: YouTube, Instagram, ReVanced, TikTok.
#A strict 3-week productivity challenge to build a habit. During this time, you wonâ€™t be able to modify the app or uninstall DigiPaws.
Specify a custom cooldown between each warning. This is unavailable for adventure mode
Please turn off and on again if problems occur, or to apply any configuration changes.
Select the apps block or get usage warnings for.
Select apps to allow during focus mode. Focus mode is a quest where one cannot access any of these apps for a desired time period. This quest cannot be stopped once started.
Act as a quest and modify Aura count?
Exit the red zone to win, with no penalty for failing. Remember to bring your device along.
$valuex squats earn 1 Aura point. Perform this quest in sets of any. Ensure your entire body is on camera above. Not working?
$valuex pushups earn 1 Aura point. Perform this quest in sets of any. Ensure your entire body is on camera above. Not working?
Focus or survival mode blocks all apps except basic needs like calling and SMS for the next 90 minutes. The competed quest grants 1 Aura, and cannot be turned off.
By continuing, you agree to the Terms and Conditions

Accessibility data is needed for preferences based on use of specific features within blocked apps, like a social media feed or a game. \n\n (Your data remains on your device and is never transferred elsewhere.)
Helps the app always act when needed.
